extendedInfo.description: Achievement checklist for Max Payne 3 on the Xbox 360, to keep track of your progress towards 1665 gamer points.. All 67 Achievements included. This includes the Local Justice Pack, Hostage Negotiation Pack, Painful Memories and Deathmatch Made in Heaven DLC Achievements.. Descriptions for all 67 Achievements. Your achievement progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your achievement progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Achievement description is shown when the selected is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Rockstar Games or Take-Two Interactive.

reviews.title: Just a checklist
reviews.comment: Nothin more nothin less. I would have liked to see tips for the achievements.
reviews.author: A Google User
